titles.title: Jesus Christ Is Lord of All

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Heav'n and earth proclaim Jesus Christ is Lord of all; King of Kings is He Whom angel hosts adore! Let men and nations bring Praises to Christ the King, Who over all shall reign Forevermore.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Sing, my heart, oh praise His name; Jesus Christ is Lord of all! Sing, ye saints, His grace proclaim; Jesus Christ is Lord of all! At His word the grave will open, At His feet death's bonds will fall. King of Kings, the mighty God, Jesus Christ is Lord of all! Jesus Christ is Lord of all!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Glorious is His name Giv'n by God in heav'n above. Name above all names, And evermore shall be. Come ev'ry knee, and bow, Come ev'ry tongue, confess That Jesus Christ is Lord Eternally
